title: Colgate Max Fresh Toothpaste, Whitening Toothpaste with Mini Breath Strips, Clean Mint Toothpaste for Bad Breath, Helps Fight Cavities, Whitens Teeth, and Freshens Breath, 4 Pack, 6.3 Oz Tubes
description: Colgate Max Fresh Toothpaste has 10X longer lasting cool*, so you can breathe confidently. This breath freshening toothpaste is packed with hundreds of mini breath strips that unleash a powerful rush of freshness for long-lasting fresh breath. Colgate Max Fresh Toothpaste with Breath Strips has a Clean Mint flavor and invigorates your brushing experience. This 4 pack of minty fluoride toothpaste leaves your breath feeling fresh for hours. Plus, this teeth whitening toothpaste fights cavities and whitens teeth leaving you with a confident smile. It’s not just a toothpaste for bad breath, Colgate Max Fresh Whitening Toothpaste with Breath Strips is also a fluoride toothpaste, so it whitens teeth and helps prevent cavities. Breathe easier with the confidence to get closer. Pair Colgate Max Fresh toothpaste with toothbrushes that polish your teeth for a bright smile you’ll love. For good oral hygiene, brush your teeth twice a day for two minutes. *vs a leading fluoride toothpaste
